021import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemDenomination;
022
023import java.math.BigDecimal;
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025
026/**
027 * Represents a denomination for an {@link Currency currency}.
028 *
029 * @author creatorfromhell
030 * @see Currency
031 * @since 0.1.2.0
032 */
033public class Denomination {
034
035  private String single;
036  private String plural;
037  private BigDecimal weight;
038
039  public Denomination(final BigDecimal weight) {
040
041    this.weight = weight;
042    this.single = "Singular";
043    this.plural = "Plural";
044  }
045
046  public static Denomination clone(final Denomination original, final boolean item) {
047
048    final Denomination cloned = (item)? new ItemDenomination(original.weight()) : new Denomination(original.weight());
049
050    cloned.setSingle(original.singular());
051    cloned.setPlural(original.plural());
052    cloned.setWeight(original.weight());
053
054    if(cloned instanceof final ItemDenomination clonedItem && original instanceof final ItemDenomination itemDenomination) {
055
056      clonedItem.enchantments(new ArrayList<>(itemDenomination.enchantments()));
057      clonedItem.flags(new ArrayList<>(itemDenomination.flags()));
058      clonedItem.setLore(new ArrayList<>(itemDenomination.getLore()));
059      clonedItem.material(itemDenomination.material());
060      clonedItem.setDamage(itemDenomination.getDamage());
061      clonedItem.setName(itemDenomination.getName());
062      clonedItem.setCustomModel(itemDenomination.getCustomModel());
063      clonedItem.setTexture(itemDenomination.getTexture());
064    }
065
066    return cloned;
067  }
068
069  public boolean isItem() {
070
071    return (this instanceof ItemDenomination);
072  }
073
074  public void setSingle(final String single) {
075
076    this.single = single;
077  }
078
079  public void setPlural(final String plural) {
080
081    this.plural = plural;
082  }
083
084  public String singular() {
085
086    return single;
087  }
088
089  public String plural() {
090
091    return plural;
092  }
093
094  public BigDecimal weight() {
095
096    return weight;
097  }
098
099  public void setWeight(final BigDecimal weight) {
100
101    this.weight = weight;
102  }
103}
